about_the_game:
This Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 content will make every fan of the Wheeler Dealers feel at home. Turn your in-game garage into the legendary workshop Mike Brewer brings cars into and feel like hosts of the show while playing your favorite game.



With this dlc you will still have access to all the game content: equipment, parts, cars, missions etc. just with an additional classy UK flavor and unique vibe of the show beloved by so many car enthusiasts worldwide.



Of course to fully admire the new looks of every part of your garage you will still need to make progress in the game and upgrade it. Don’t hesitate, pour yourself a cup of good black tea, roll up your sleeves and get to work!


© 2022 Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates. Wheeler Dealers and related logos are trademarks of Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates, used under license. All rights reserved. 2022 Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates. Discovery and related logos are trademarks of Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates, used under license. All rights reserved.
detailed_description:
This Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 content will make every fan of the Wheeler Dealers feel at home. Turn your in-game garage into the legendary workshop Mike Brewer brings cars into and feel like hosts of the show while playing your favorite game.



With this dlc you will still have access to all the game content: equipment, parts, cars, missions etc. just with an additional classy UK flavor and unique vibe of the show beloved by so many car enthusiasts worldwide.



Of course to fully admire the new looks of every part of your garage you will still need to make progress in the game and upgrade it. Don’t hesitate, pour yourself a cup of good black tea, roll up your sleeves and get to work!


© 2022 Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates. Wheeler Dealers and related logos are trademarks of Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates, used under license. All rights reserved. 2022 Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates. Discovery and related logos are trademarks of Discovery or its subsidiaries and affiliates, used under license. mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB or ATI Radeon HD 7870 2GB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GAME DOES NOT SUPPORT Intel Integrated Graphics Cards!
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB or Radeon Pro 570 4GB (Does not support Intel Integrated Graphics Cards)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GAME DOES NOT SUPPORT Intel Integrated Graphics Cards!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
